instructor_page_description: Become an instructor and change lives — including your own
teach_your_way_description: Publish the course you want, in the way you want, and always have control of your own content.
inspire_learners_ddescription: Teach what you know and help learners explore their interests, gain new skills, and advance their careers.
get_rewarded_description: Expand your professional network, build your expertise, and earn money on each paid enrollment.
how_to_begin_1_text_1: You start with your passion and knowledge. Then choose a promising topic with the help of our Marketplace Insights tool.
how_to_begin_1_text_2: The way that you teach — what you bring to it — is up to you.
how_to_begin_1_text_3: We offer plenty of resources on how to create your first course. And, our instructor dashboard and curriculum pages help keep you organized.
how_to_begin_2_text_1: Use basic tools like a smartphone or a DSLR camera. Add a good microphone and you’re ready to start.
how_to_begin_2_text_2: If you don’t like being on camera, just capture your screen. Either way, we recommend two hours or more of video for a paid course.
how_to_begin_2_text_3: Our support team is available to help you throughout the process and provide feedback on test videos.
how_to_begin_3_text_1: Gather your first ratings and reviews by promoting your course through social media and your professional networks.
how_to_begin_3_text_2: Your course will be discoverable in our marketplace where you earn revenue from each paid enrollment.
how_to_begin_3_text_3: Our custom coupon tool lets you offer enrollment incentives while our global promotions drive traffic to courses.
become_instructor_today_descritpion: Join one of the world’s largest online learning marketplaces.
students_description: Enrolled users to your video courses and analytics
all_courses_description: Manage your video courses and refactoring any time instructor
create_course_description: Note that when you're creating video course it will be draft
title: Title
what_students_will_learn: What will students learn in your video course? Note: In this field, list the topics or skills students will learn during the video course. Enter each topic on a new line — it will be a separate tag.
requirements: Requirements. Note: In this field, list the requirements for students to take the course. Enter each requirement on a new line — it will be a separate tag.
course_tags: Note: In this field, enter the video course tags. Enter each tag on a new line — it will be a separate tag.
edit_course_description: Managing video courses and create curriculum for your video courses
curriculum_description: Manage curriculum for your video course
draft_courses_description: Manage your draft video courses and activated it instructor
revenue_title: Hi Video Instructor, that's your revenue statistics
revenue_report_description: You get paid directly from stripe yo your bank account every 48 hours
payouts_description: Update your video account details or view previous payouts
successfully_created_course_description: You can customize your curriculum for your course
successfully_drafted_course: Successfully added to draft video course
name: Name
